## Assignment 2

Importing data and recoding variables

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
affect_data <- read_sav("PSYR6003.A2.sav")
view(affect_data)
unique(affect_data$sex)

##Changing the variable 'sex' into a factor instead of a string
affect_data$sex <- factor(affect_data$sex, levels = c("Female", "Male", "Other (specify)"), labels = c(0, 1, 2))
view(affect_data)
view(affect_data$sex)

```

Subscale totals

```{r}
affect_data <- mutate(affect_data, 
                      mps.SPP.3y_total = mps.SPP1.3y + mps.SPP2.3y + mps.SPP3.3y + mps.SPP4.3y + mps.SPP5.3y,
                      guilt.3y_total = guilt1.3y + guilt2.3y + guilt3.3y,
                      dep.3y = dep1.3y + dep2.3y + dep3.3y,
                      fear.3y_total = fear1.3y + fear2.3y + fear3.3y,
                      host.3y_total = host1.3y + host2.3y + host3.3y
                      )
view(affect_data)
affect_data <- mutate(affect_data, tipm.CONS2.3y_reversed = 8 - tipm.CONS2.3y)

affect_data <- mutate(affect_data, tipm_total = tipm.CONS1.3y + tipm.CONS2.3y_reversed)

view(affect_data)
```
